about_the_game:
Dear Citizen, you have been selected to test drive the new Tether Tech Roller™. This is an experimental vehicle designed for non-linear travel by means of cutting edge Roll, Jump, Swing and Glide technology. With the Tether Tech Roller™ technology you can Roll, Jump, Swing and Glide seamlessly, at great speeds! Complete deliveries faster and earn more points while driving the Tether Tech Roller™!

ROLL
Generate torque and boost along the ground at great speeds.

JUMP
Convert speed to height using the leg spring approach favoured by gymnasts.

SWING
Tether to any surface and combine with boost and look direction to fling across the map.

GLIDE
Gain height and glide over long distances converting height for speed for tremendous acceleration.

COMBINE
Using all the features together there is no limit to what you can accomplish in the Tether Tech Roller™!
detailed_description:
Dear Citizen, you have been selected to test drive the new Tether Tech Roller™. This is an experimental vehicle designed for non-linear travel by means of cutting edge Roll, Jump, Swing and Glide technology. With the Tether Tech Roller™ technology you can Roll, Jump, Swing and Glide seamlessly, at great speeds! Complete deliveries faster and earn more points while driving the Tether Tech Roller™!

ROLL
Generate torque and boost along the ground at great speeds.

JUMP
Convert speed to height using the leg spring approach favoured by gymnasts.

SWING
Tether to any surface and combine with boost and look direction to fling across the map.

GLIDE
Gain height and glide over long distances converting height for speed for tremendous acceleration.

COMBINE
Using all the features together there is no limit to what you can accomplish in the Tether Tech Roller™!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or Newer, ATI 7950 or Newer
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: More than one Gamepad or Controller required for Splitscreen

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.8.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670, NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M, Intel HD Graphics 4000 or Iris Pro Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.8.5 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.4+ GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670, NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: More than one Gamepad or Controller required for Splitscreen (Steam Controller works natively on Mac)

name: Tether: ROLL, JUMP, SWING, GLIDE!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or Newer, ATI 7950 or Newer
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: More than one Gamepad or Controller required for Splitscreen

short_description: With the Tether Tech Roller™ you can Roll, Jump, Swing and Glide seamlessly at great speeds without any injury! Earn more for a higher score in the Delivery Mode. Get your Tether Tech Roller™ today! Despite some users reporting injury we can assure you that the chances of that occurring are low.
